setWaitForStreamThreads(boolean) - Method in class fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.externprog.ExternalProgram
By default, after the main process has terminated (without error) the ExternalProgram.run(WriterFeeder, ReaderConsumer, ReaderConsumer) method will wait for the stream controller threads to end (they can need more time to consume the output).

SimpleInputReader - Class in fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.align
General reader processing alignment in a simple way: simply sends separators (if necessary) to the consumer; any token received from the annotated text must at least be a prefix for the current token in the reference text (possibly ignoring case).
